DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy safety nebivolol monotherapy Hispanic patient stage 1 stage 2 hypertension
DOC.brief_title: A Study Efficacy Safety Nebivolol Monotherapy Hispanic Hypertensive Patients
DOC.criteria: Male female outpatient 18 80 year age , selfidentified Hispanic Latino ethnicity Females must postmenopausal , pregnant use approved contraceptive regimen Meet criterion stage I II hypertension Currently treat , treat two antihypertensive medication Secondary hypertension Are take three antihypertensive agent Have uncontrolled poorly control diabetes mellitus type I type II Evidence concurrent disease condition might interfere conduct study Participation investigational study within 30 day Screening ( Visit 1 ) . Have history hypersensitivity nebivolol βblockers , contraindication βblocker use
